INRA=Institut National de la Recherche Agronomique

Research Director at the Plant Health and Environment Department of INRA. I lead at the Center for Biology and Population Management (CBGP) INRA laboratory, a team of 4 permanents, 2 PhDs and several visitors. I coordinate research on biodiversity and population genetics of economical important arthropods, with focus in agricultural mite pests. Emphasis is done on invasive species and the analysis of pest introduction risk into new regions
